BACKENDHOST_HELP: The host that serves the backend server
ERROR_OPEN:
<cmd>: error: file could not be opened:
  {}
EPILOG_STRING:
Default command-line: viasp --models 0 [files]

viasp is part of Potassco: https://potassco.org/
Get help/report bugs via : https://potassco.org/support
COPYRIGHT_STRING:
Copyright (C) Stephan Zwicknagl, Luis Glaser
License: The MIT License <https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT>
VIASP_FILES_HELP_STRING:
: Files containing ASP encodings
	  Optionally, a single JSON file defining the answer set(s) in clingo's
	  `--outf=2` format
VIASP_STDIN_HELP_STRING: : Standard input in form of an ASP encoding or JSON in clingo's `--outf=2` format
VIASP_RESET_HELP: : Stop and reset viasp server state
CLINGO_MODELS_HELP: : Compute at most <n> models (0 for all)
CLINGO_SELECT_MODEL_HELP:
: Select only one of the models when using a json input
	  Defined by an index for accessing the models, starting in index 0
	  Can appear multiple times to select multiple models
CLINGRAPH_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: If included, a Clingraph visualization will be made.
CLINGRAPH_ENGINE_HELP: : The visualization engine (refer to clingraph documentation)
CLINGRAPH_TYPE_HELP: : The graph type (refer to clingraph documentation)
RELAXER_PRINT_RELAX_HELP: : Use the relaxer and output the transformed program
RELAXER_RELAX_HELP: : Use the relaxer and visualize the transformed program
RELAXER_GROUP_HELP: Options for the relaxation of integrity constraints in unsatisfiable programs.
RELAXER_HEAD_NAME_HELP: : The name of the head predicate
RELAXER_COLLECT_VARIABLE_NAME_HELP: : Do not collect variables from body as a tuple in the head literal
WARN_UNSATISFIABLE_STRING:
The input program is unsatisfiable. To visualize the relaxed program use:
    Options for the relaxation of integrity constraints in unsatisfiable programs.
        --print-relax:      Use the relaxer and output the transformed program
        --relax      : Use the relaxer and visualize the transformed program
WARN_NO_STABLE_MODEL: The relaxed program has no stable models.
WARN_OPTIMALITY_NOT_GUARANTEED: (clingo): #models not 0: optimality of last model not guaranteed.
SWITCH_TO_TRANSFORMED_VISUALIZATION: No answer sets found. Switching to transformed visualization.
DEREGISTER_SESSION_FAILED:
Failed to deregister session [{}] ({})
This may have prevented proper shutdown of the server. 
    To stop and reset the server run: viasp --reset
